remarks: The value of a continuous function from ` J ` to ` K ` at point ` P ` belongs to the underlying set of topology ` K ` .  (Contributed by FL, 27-Dec-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
iscnp2.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
iscnp2.2 $e |- Y = U. K $.
cnpcl $p |- ( ( F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` P ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( F ` A ) e. Y ) $.
